content: treat yourself with a luxury crochet soap saver this lovely crochet soap saver pattern was designed to have texture - both for visual and touchable interest the puff stitches add a touch of luxury and using a soft cotton yarn ensures that the crochet soap bag feels great to use from the start and bumps up the treat yourself feeling ★skill level advanced beginner crocheters looking to follow this pattern should know how to *read a crochet pattern - there is not a video tutorial for this crochet soap saver pattern *work the basic stitches - chain slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet and double_crochet *work the puff or be willing to learn *work in the 3rd loop only or be willing to learn *create chain 1 spaces and work into them *work in closed rounds including how to slip_stitch to close a round turn the work etc *work into the bottom of chains to create the base oval or be willing to learn this is not a beginner pattern absolute beginners will find this pattern way outside of their skill level there may even be some skills that an advanced beginner needs to learn to follow this pattern but it should not be difficult especially with the step-by-step photo tutorials included in the pattern ★ pattern includes 1 full version pdf with photo tutorials for all special stitches special techniques and step by step through each round of the pattern as well as making and placing the cord this photo tutorial also has the steps written in detail not short hand to help beginners through 2 printer friendly pdf with no photo tutorial to help save ink for crocheters who prefer to print their patterns ★terms used us standard - pattern is written in english ★size one size approximately 3 25 inches wide x 4 inches tall finished crochet soap sock fits the average soap bar that is purchasable in stores ★materials required medium 4 weight 100% cotton yarn you will need approximately 0 5 oz / 20g / 31 yds yarn used we crochet s dishie in colorways sunbaked orange kenai blue and linen cream this yarn is 100% cotton 190 yds / 100 g per skein ★tools 4 5 mm g+ hook tapestry needle scissors stitch markers this crochet soap saver pattern comes with two downloads - one is the full version and one is the printer friendly version make sure to download both make sure to tag me in your instagram photos so i can show you some love tag @theloopholefoxcrochet or use #theloopholefoxcrochet to show me your finished work i hope you enjoy treating yourself with the radiant crochet soap saver pattern happy crocheting the loophole fox
